text: Christopher W. "Chris" Cooper (born July 9, 1951) is an American actor. He is known for his role as John Laroche in the 2002 movie Adaptation for which he won an Academy Award and an Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actor. Cooper was born in Kansas City, Missouri.Chris Cooper biography. Film Reference.com. He was raised in Houston, Texas. Cooper studied at Stephens College and at the University of Missouri. He has been married to Marianne Leone since 1983. They had one son, Jesse Cooper who died in 2005 from SUDEP.
